ResearchProjectDef.label: 20mm Flak 38
ResearchProjectDef.description: A 20mm anti-aircraft autocannon turret. Uses the 20x20mm API magazine with magazine storage of 8 mags. 2m min range, 40m Max Range. Fires with 150 RPM fire rate. Explodes with radius of 1 block when destroyed.

ResearchProjectDef.label: 40mm Bofors M1
ResearchProjectDef.description: A 40mm Bofors autocannon turret. Uses 4x40mm Ammunition Clips with ammunition storage of 20 clips. 2m min range, 60m max range. Explodes with radius of 1 block when destroyed.

ResearchProjectDef.label: 30mm L21A1 RARDEN
ResearchProjectDef.description: Uses 30mm HS831A shell. 3m Min range, 70m Max range. Fires a burst of 6 shots at about 92 RPM and cools down for 1.5 second between each bursts. Has internal ammo capacity of 100 3x ammo clips. Explodes with radius of 1 block when destroyed.

ResearchProjectDef.label: 30mm Zwilingsflak MK103
ResearchProjectDef.description: Uses 30mm SprGr shell. 3m Min range, 70m Max range. Fires at a constant rate of 300 Rounds per Minute. Has internal ammo capacity of 200 rounds. Explodes with radius of 1 block when destroyed.

ResearchProjectDef.label: 40mm M247
ResearchProjectDef.description: Uses 40mm M811 shell. 4m Min range, 80m Max range. Fires at a constant rate of 600 Rounds per Minute. Has internal ammo capacity of 580 rounds. Consumes 200W of power. Because of the height, it can't be placed under roof. Explodes with radius of 1 block when destroyed.

ResearchProjectDef.label: 37mm Flak M42
ResearchProjectDef.description: A manned 37mm Flak M42 autocannon turret. Uses the 37mm PzGr shell in a belt-feed ammunition system with capacity of 300 rounds. 2m min range, 50m max range. Explodes with radius of 1 block when destroyed.

ResearchProjectDef.label: 20mm RH-202
ResearchProjectDef.description: Uses 20mm HS827 shell. 3m Min range, 70m Max range. Fires a burst of 15 shots at about 720 RPM and cools down for 1.5 second between each bursts. Has internal ammo capacity of 1250 shells. Explodes with radius of 1 block when destroyed. Uses 500W of power.

ResearchProjectDef.label: 30mm 2A42 Shipunov
ResearchProjectDef.description: Uses 30mm 3UOF8 shell. 3m Min range, 70m Max range. Fires a burst of 8 shots at about 514 RPM and cools down for 1 second between each bursts. Has internal ammo capacity of 500 shells. Explodes with radius of 1 block when destroyed. Uses 100W of power.

ResearchProjectDef.label: 25mm SIDAM 25
ResearchProjectDef.description: Uses 25mm PMB090 shell. 4m Min range, 80m Max range. Fires a burst of 20 shots at about 1200 RPM and cools down for 1 second between each bursts. Has internal ammo capacity of 600 shells. Explodes with radius of 1 block when destroyed. Uses 500W of power.

ResearchProjectDef.label: unmanned large autocannons
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to research and build the unmanned variant of large autocannons.

ResearchProjectDef.label: unmanned 20mm Flak 38
ResearchProjectDef.description: An unmanned version of 20mm Flak 38 Turret.
